author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

Following https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideHowToGetDataFromES#In_ED_module

Fixes DT DQM modules for issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
title: DTDQM migration to ESConsumes
